snippet: Downloadable files that can be used to make a gun with a 3-D printer were removed after the State Department said that posting the files may violate arms-exporting regulations.
abstract: Web site run by Texas law student Cody Wilson removes downloadable files that can be used to make a gun with 3-D printer after State Department says that posting the files may violate arms-exporting regulations.
lead_paragraph: Downloadable files that can be used to make a gun with a 3-D printer were removed after the State Department said that posting the files may violate arms-exporting regulations.

headline.main: Texas: Web Site Removes Do-It-Yourself Gun Plans
headline.print_headline: Texas: Web Site Removes Do-It-Yourself Gun Plans
